Description:
Commission Based JobWe are hiring new motivated team work property consultants who can work both independently and as part of team.We are an investment company with over 17 years experience in investing in real estate. after expanding we have put our focus now in establish a new real estate company to help owner and buyers te get the best out of their sales or rent. We will put our focus on clients relationship for long term.Negotiation skills are required, as well as the ability to engage with buyers and sellers to establish mutually advantageous agreements.If you feel you can be a part our team don't hesitate to contact us.We provide company visa and health insurance.Salary is based on commission. Qualified Leads
Attractive and Competitive Commission Structure
Monthly allowance for business calls 
Real Estate License ( RERA)
Career Progression & Growth
In-house training and continuous mentoring 
In-house Digital Marketing support 
Strong Admin support
Access to Exclusive Projects Inventory
Positive & diverse work culture with a well-equipped game room for recreation
30 days Annual Leave
Employment visa

Opportunity to work with some of the top brokers in the industry.Skills
